attributes.action: Show support to Jeremy Corbyn who was democratically elected by the people.
attributes.background: Jeremy Corbyn was elected by the people. Now, the elitist Blairites want to get rid of him despite the people still wanting him as leader of the Labour Party. Sign this petition to show your support and a move away from the elitist politics we have had for so long.

rejection.details: This is a party political matter, not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.
